content.value:
How much do I need to pay to use this project? The project has costs like buying documents and to keep the website online, but the main goal of this project is to give knowledge, so you do not need to pay anything to access the project. This is an open-source software offered with GPL 3 or later, we also give to you all the site content through our GitHub repo.

How can I help the project? You have different options to help the project:

  • If you follow the scientific method, or you would like to learn it, open a PR in our GitHub repository adding data of a research you made using a model recognized by the site;
  • If you do not research, but you would like to know more about a specific family, you can open an issue in our repository, and we will study and bringing information about the family;

Why do we need another genealogical project? There are different genealogical projects that that help people to make their family tree, some of them are collaborative and people can work together to find their ancestors. This project does not have the goal to be more one website or software to make family trees and compete with them, the main goal is to help the people to use the scientific method and understand how their family knowledge grew during the centuries. This project does not treat only the people relationship, but we also work with different issues that make equal people to be different.
